mapper.update: update ADS_MONITOR_TASK set TASK_NAME = #{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MONITOR_CLASS = #{monitorClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RELEASE_UNIT = #{releaseUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECK_MODEL = #{checkModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YEAR = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BATCH = #{batch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEPARATION = #{separation,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, START_TIME = to_timestamp(#{startTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss:ff'), END_TIME = to_timestamp(#{endTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss:ff'), DEADLINE = to_timestamp(#{deadline},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss:ff'), ATTACHMENT = #{attachment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTACHMENTCODE = #{attachmentcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "COMMENT" = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INDUSTRY = #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAMPLE_LINK = #{sampleLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECK_OBJECT = #{checkObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECK_PROJECT = #{checkProject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = sysdate, ATTACHMENT_ADDRESS = #{attachmentAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID , TASK_NAME , MONITOR_CLASS , RELEASE_UNIT , CHECK_MODEL , YEAR , BATCH , SEPARATION , to_char(START_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') START_TIME , to_char(END_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') END_TIME , to_char(DEADLINE,'yyyy-mm-dd') DEADLINE , ATTACHMENT , ATTACHMENTCODE , "COMMENT" , PUBLISH_STATUS , INDUSTRY , JUDGE_STANDARD , SAMPLE_LINK , CHECK_OBJECT , CHECK_PROJECT , DEL_FLAG , CREATE_BY , UPDATE_BY , CREATE_TIME , UPDATE_TIME , TASK_SOURCE , ATTACHMENT_ADDRESS , CREATE_ORG_REGION_ID , LEVEL_ENUM , SUP_ID from ADS_MONITOR_TASK where ID =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
